item.description:
This walk will be cancelled for rain or temps under 15 degrees...otherwise, we're on!!  I was at the beach today, and it's so beautiful in winter!!  I'm not sure what the tide will be, but either way, there's always plenty of sand for a long walk. I'll be bringing my dog, so we'll stick to the leashed dog side of the beach, and I won't be going through the dunes since dogs are not allowed. Plan on a fairly quick walking pace....18 minute mile? We'll walk for 1.5-2 hours (basically down the beach and back, which is about 4 miles total.  Dress accordingly (especially since it will be cooler and windier on the coast...I'd recommend a face shield or neck warmer as well). My schedule that day is such that I won't be able to host any post-walk social gathering, but if anyone wants to step up and organize the group after, feel free :)

The beach charges admission- $7 per carload I believe, or $4 for members, so you might consider carpooling from the Ipswich train station. 

**Please bring a dollar to contribute towards this group's Meetup group fees**

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Beach walk at Crane Beach
